description: Shopee Open Platform documentation introduction page

main_features.name: Powerful APIs

main_features.name: Comprehensive developer services
main_features.description: End-to-end developer support for onboarding, APP development, testing, release, and maintenance

main_features.name: Management Features
items: Access Open API testing tools, test accounts and sandbox testing environments
Get important information through Announcement page, Documentation, and Support Center

user_types.description: Access to comprehensive range of Open APIs for Shopee's key ecommerce processes
Develop software tailored to business needs, integrate systems for operations optimization and data management

notes: This is an introduction page that doesn't contain specific API endpoints or parameters. It provides overview information about the Shopee Open Platform, its features, benefits, and target users. The page includes a navigation menu on the left showing various documentation sections like Getting Started, API calls, Authorization, etc.
